import React from "react"; function AddToCart({productsInCart}){ const displayProductsInCart = productsInCart.map((product) => { return( (
{product.title}

{description}

  • Price: Ksh {price}
  • Section: {category}
  • Rating: {rating}/5
{(quantity===0) ? () : (
{quantity} in cart
)}
) ) }) return ( <> ) } export default AddToCart;
